smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Object 'AppPaths' with '19' functions detected. Defined threshold inside objects is set to '11'
Object 'VpnServiceBuilder' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside objects is set to '11'
Class 'ViewLogActivity' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'BaseActivity' with '16' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'StartActivity' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function configure appears to be too complex.
The function startVpn appears to be too complex.

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

smells.name: SpreadOperator
smells.description: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

instances.message: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: LoggerFactory.getILoggerFactory() cannot be safely cast to LoggerContext.
LoggerFactory.getLogger(Logger.ROOT_LOGGER_NAME) cannot be safely cast to Logger.
headerObj cannot be safely cast to PemHeader.
activity cannot be safely cast to BaseActivity.
activity!!.getSystemService(Context.LAYOUT_INFLATER_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to LayoutInflater.
start_activity_network_list_fragment cannot be safely cast to NetworkListFragment.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: android.view.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: OptionalUnit
smells.description: Return type of 'Unit' is unnecessary and can be safely removed.

instances.message: The function onActivityResult defines a return type of Unit. This is unnecessary and can safely be removed.
The function startVpn defines a return type of Unit. This is unnecessary and can safely be removed.
The function stopVpn defines a return type of Unit. This is unnecessary and can safely be removed.

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
smells.description: Data classes should mainly be used to store data and should not have any extra functions. (Compiler will automatically generate equals, toString and hashCode functions)

instances.message: The data class NodeInfo contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called reachabilityText
The data class VpnInterfaceConfiguration contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called write

smells.name: ThrowsCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of throw statements in methods.

instances.message: Too many throw statements in the function forkExec. The maximum number of allowed throw statements is 2.

smells.name: PreferToOverPairSyntax
smells.description: Pair was created using the Pair constructor, using the to syntax is preferred.

instances.message: Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `PemUtils.read(it) to it`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `PemUtils.decrypt(it.first, currentPassphrase) to it.second`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `if (newPassphrase?.isNotEmpty() == true) PemUtils.encrypt(it.first, newPassphrase) else it.first to it.second`

Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `TincKeyring.openPrivateKey(tincCfg.ed25519PrivateKeyFile ?: AppPaths.defaultEd25519PrivateKeyFile(netName), passphrase) to TincKeyring.openPrivateKey(tincCfg.privateKeyFile ?: AppPaths.defaultRsaPrivateKeyFile(netName), passphrase)`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `null to null`

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function startVpn has 12 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
